432800.name: Crashlands Soundtrack
432800.description:
The sound track for Crashlands, composed by Fat Bard, features all of the music created for the game along with a few remixes. The songs have been fully re-mastered for this release and are in 320kbps MP3 and FLAC format.

Tracks
01 Crashlands!
02 BS SS Assess
03 Crashlanded
04 Savannah Suite
05 The Tendraam
06 Build Bossa
07 Night Time
08 Fight Time
09 Bawg Suite
10 The Brubus
11 Tundra Suite
12 The Polari
13 The Final Delivery
14 Crashlands! RAWK Remix
15 Bawg Electro Swingin Remix
16 EMBIGGENED
17 Night Time Bawg Remix
18 Night Time Tundra Remix

Files will be placed within the Crashlands folder in the Steam Directory: Steam\steamapps\common\Crashlands\Soundtrack
432800.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
